definitions.title: n. f.
definitions.body: resting-place, rest;—abs. ´[[מ]] Mic 2:10 +, [[מְנֻחָה]] Ge 49:15 (but v. infr.), 2Sa 14:17; sf. [[מְנוּחָתִי]] Ps 95:11 + 2 t., [[מְנוּחָתְֶָ]] Ps 132:8 = 2Ch 6:41 (where rd. as in Psalm, for anom. [[לְנוּחְֶָ]] MT), [[מְנֻחָתוֹ]] Is 11:10, Zec 9:1; pl. [[מְנוּחׂת]] Is 32:18, [[מְנֻחוֹת]] Ps 23:2; —

resting-place Mic 2:10, Nu 10:33 (JE), De 12:9 (+ [[הַנַּחֲלָה]]) so Ps 95:11 (´[[י]]'s resting- pl.), cf. Ps 132:8 = 2Ch 6:41 (v. supr.), Ps 132:14, Is 66:1 (‖[[בַּיִת אֲשֶׁר תִּבְנוּ לִי]]), cf. ´[[לַאֲרוֹן וגו]] ´[[בֵּית מ]] 1Ch 28:2; also Is 11:10; prob. also Ge 49:15 (‖ [[טוֹב הָאָרֶץ]] here is appar. subst., Sam. rds. adj. [[טוֹבָה]]; but rd. perh. [[מְנֻחהׁ]], his resting-place, fr. [[מָנוֹחַ]], Ball:Hpt Holz after SyrVer); [[מְנוּחׂת שַׁאֲנַנּוֹת]] Is 32:18 (+ [[נְוֵה שָׁלוֹם]], [[מִשְׁכְּנוֹת מִבְטַחִים]]); of ´[[י]]'s word Zec 9:1; resting-place on journey, in ´[[שַׂר מ]] Je 51:59 (Ew Gf Gie al.); fig. for security, assurance 2Sa 14:17 (taken from resting, equilibrium, of scale acc. to Klo).

rest, quietness, pl. [[מֵי מְנֻחוֹת]] Ps 23:2; = refreshment Is 28:12 (‖[[מַרְגֵּעָה]]); rest (fr. enemies) = peace 1Ki 8:56 (cf. 1Ki 5:18), ´[[אִישׁ מ]] 1Ch 22:9 a man of peace (cf. [[הֵנִיחַ]] v:b); = relief fr. sorrow Je 45:3; condition of rest and security attained by marriage Ru 1:9 (= [[מָנוֹחַ]] Ru 3:1).—´[[מ]] Ju Jdg 20:43 is perh. n. pr., cf. GFM.
